entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
